item.title: Bacon ice cream and nugget overload sees misfiring McDonald's AI withdrawn
item.description: The voice recognition system seems not to have recognised what customers were really ordering.

item.title: Building a $2bn online game by breaking the rules
item.description: How the Elder Scrolls Online survived a difficult launch to become a quiet gaming success story.

item.title: Software giant Adobe accused of 'trapping customers'
item.description: Regulators allege Adobe failed to properly disclose subscription terms and made it too onerous to cancel.

item.title: Apple scraps its Pay Later loan scheme
item.description: It marks a retreat for the technology giant from plans to offer traditional financial services.

item.title: US surgeon general wants social media warning labels
item.description: Vivek Murthy says social media increases the risk that children will experience anxiety and depression.

item.title: 'Hackers leaked intimate photos after my laptop was stolen'
item.description: A Spanish filmmaker turned the cameras on herself and made a "sextortion diary" after being blackmailed.

item.title: Virtual camera operators: The unsung heroes of esports
item.description: A different kind of esports pro explains how they capture all the action during tense matches.

item.title: Is Elon Musk worth his $56bn Tesla pay package?
item.description: He is beloved by his millions of followers online, but would Musk's businesses have succeeded without him?

item.title: 'Mouse jigglers' pretending to work fired by bank
item.description: Wells Fargo has fired a number of workers, after reviewing claims of fake keyboard activity.

item.description: Space agency says the clip was from a training exercise which was accidentally put on YouTube,

item.title: Tesla investors back $56bn Musk pay deal
item.description: The multi-billionaire had campaigned for the payout, which is worth up to $56bn.

item.description: A jailbreak version of ChatGPT is becoming popular with women who prefer it to real world dating.

item.title: College students on life without a smartphone

item.title: GameStop raises over $2bn after Roaring Kitty rally
item.description: The company said it had sold all 75 million shares it had offered to investors.

item.title: Genetic testing firm 23andMe investigated over hack
item.description: Criminals gained access to 6.9 million records when the firm was hacked in October 2023.

item.title: Apple brings ChatGPT to iPhones in AI overhaul
item.description: The company has been slower to roll out generative AI features than rivals including Google and Microsoft.

item.title: Plans to use Facebook and Instagram posts to train AI criticised
